title: Advancing the Arabic WordNet: Elevating Content Quality
abstract: arXiv:2403.20215v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: High-quality WordNets are crucial for achieving high-quality results in NLP applications that rely on such resources. However, the wordnets of most languages suffer from serious issues of correctness and completeness with respect to the words and word meanings they define, such as incorrect lemmas, missing glosses and example sentences, or an inadequate, Western-centric representation of the morphology and the semantics of the language. Previous efforts have largely focused on increasing lexical coverage while ignoring other qualitative aspects. In this paper, we focus on the Arabic language and introduce a major revision of the Arabic WordNet that addresses multiple dimensions of lexico-semantic resource quality. As a result, we updated more than 58% of the synsets of the existing Arabic WordNet by adding missing information and correcting errors. tldr: 本文关注阿拉伯语，通过对阿拉伯语WordNet进行重大修订，提高内容质量，更新了超过58%的同义词集，并解决了词形错误和缺失信息等问题
en_tdlr: This paper focuses on the Arabic language, introduces a major revision of the Arabic WordNet to improve content quality, updates over 58% of synsets, and addresses issues such as lemma errors and missing information.
